data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hemp, Claudia (2013): Annotated list of Tettigoniidae (Orthoptera) from the East Usambara Mountains Tanzania and new Tettigoniidae species from East Africa. Zootaxa 3737 (4): 301-350, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3737.4.1
